game.name: Invisible Room
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Invisible Room is an audio-based puzzle game where players rely on sound and clues to uncover hidden truths. Without visuals, the game challenges your auditory perception and logical reasoning, using both audio cues and physical props to solve puzzles.
